remark.en: Those who take this course need to get the advisor‘s approval.
remark.ch: 五年雙學位須修讀，須先經指導教授同意後才可選修此門課程

goal.en: To learn the basic skills of research
goal.ch: 讓學生瞭解作研究的方法及如何呈現研究的成果

content.en:
"1. Search for research literature
2. Literature review
3. terminology
4. data presentation
5. Thesis writing
6. Oral Presentation"
content.ch:
"(1) 研究論文資料檢索
(2) 論文閱讀
(3) 工程術語
(4) 數據呈現方式
(5) 論文寫作格式
(6) 工程簡報"

method.en: Lecture Practical Training Lab Individual Instruction
method.ch: 講授 實習/實驗 個別指導

grading.ch: "作業 20% 口頭報告 25% 書面報告 25% 指導教授評分 30%"

en.competency: The Ability of Using Math, Science, and Engineering Knowledge
en.Assessments: Assignments ， Presentation/Oral Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper)

en.competency: The Ability of Implementing Practical Engineering
en.Assessments: Assignments ， Presentation/Oral Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper)

en.competency: The Ability of Designing, Conducting, and Analyzing Experiments
en.Assessments: Assignments ， Presentation/Oral Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper)

en.competency: The Ability in Design and Supervision of Civil Engineering Projects
en.Assessments: Assignments ， Presentation/Oral Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper)

en.competency: The Ability of Projet Management, Interpersonal Communication, Technical Experssiveness and Writing
The Ability of Teamwork and Integration
The Ability of Finding, Analzing, and Solving Problems Actively
en.Assessments: Assignments ， Presentation/Oral Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper)

en.competency: The Ability of Absorbing New Information, International Perspective and Self-Learning
en.Assessments: Assignments ， Presentation/Oral Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper)

en.competency: Interaction Between Technology and the Environment/Ecology
Engineering Ethics and Taking Social Responsibility, Having Humanity Disposition and the Spirit to Serve the Public

ch.Assessments: 作業練習 ， 口頭報告/口試 ， 專題研究報告(書面)
作業練習 ， 口頭報告/口試 ， 專題研究報告(書面)
